name: VI
additionalNotes:
Altadis U.S.A just introduced Siglo Limited Reserve! "The highly anticipated Nicaraguan Cigar marks a significant new entry in the premium online cigar market"

Mike's Cigars is proud to be the first to introduce the Siglo Limited Reserve made by Altadis USA. This is the first time they are making an exceptional Nicaraguan Cigar, handcrafted under the guidance of celebrated master blender Frank Llaneza. This cigar, characterized by it's extraordinary boldness, complexity and a rich, fuller body.

Siglo Limited Reserve's bold flavor is derived from the finest Broadleaf binder and hand-selected Dominican and Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos, highlighted by a robust Ecuadorian Cubano wrapper.
